title: President condoles death of Pervaiz Khattak’s wife
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 24 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Monday expressed grief over the death of former chief minister of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Pervaiz Khattak’s wife.
The president prayed to Allah Almighty for peace of the departed soul.
He also sympathised with the bereaved family and prayed for strength to them to bear the loss with fortitude.
